[all packages] [class hierarchy] [index]

package zeta.format.impl

  • public abstract class CompoundFormat (pure interface)
    This abstract class shall be inherited by all Format classes that are essentially built up
  • public class FormatAppend (pure interface)
    This is a compound Format class for a list of Formats that should be printed 'beside' each
  • public class FormatBeneath (pure interface)
    This is a compound Format class for component Format texts that should be printed beneath
  • public class FormatBeside (pure interface)
    This is a compound Format class for a list of Formats that should be printed 'beside' each
  • public class FormatBlock (pure interface)
    This compound Format class is for Formats that should be appended to one another
  • public class FormatBreak (pure interface)
    This is the basic Format class for forced newlines. It can contain a number of newlines.
  • public class FormatEmpty (pure interface)
    This class is a basic Format containing nothing and doing nothing upon printing
  • public class FormatGroup (pure interface)
    This is a specialization of the class FormatBeside for a list of Formats that should be
  • public class FormatLine (pure interface)
    This is a compound Format class for component Format texts that should either be printed
  • public class FormatPrinter (pure interface)
    The FormatPrinter class defines functions for computing and printing Formats for all kinds
  • public class FormatSpace (pure interface)
    This is the Format class for spaces that can be ignored at the beginning and end of a
  • public class FormatState (pure interface)
    A class which realizes a state-oriented frontend to the formatting facilities
  • public class FormatStream (pure interface)
    This class contains a PrintWriter and prints texts, spaces and newlines on that stream
  • public class FormatText (pure interface)
    This class is a basic Format containing a String without newlines
  • public abstract class NestedFormat (pure interface)
    This abstract class is an extension of the abstract class Format and is to be inherited by
  • public class TextRectangle (pure interface)
